description.narrative: The project is a multi-pronged platform project which contains several sets of technical assistance to support China to address above-mentioned challenges and help implement the 2030 Agenda in the local level.

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

description.narrative: 1.1) Number of SDG Localization Advisory Committee meetings convened every year. 1.2) Quality of advices given by the SDG Localization Advisory Committee. 2.1) Number of SDGs disseminated and submitted to central government. 9.1) Number of case studies for sustainable development. 9.2) Number of local governments influenced by the case studies. 10.1) Number of compiled standardized material and Massive Open Online Courses (MOOC). 10.2) Number of training modules based on local needs. 11.1) Number of trainings delivered on sustainable development, including training 1.1) 1 SDG Localization Advisory Committee meeting convened. 2.1) 1 SDGs Business Cooperation Committee meetings convened. 2.2) 0 companies which changes to align their operations with SDG standards. 3.1) Moderate number of platform for multi-stakeholder engagement is created, such as taskforces, cross-department work teams, SDG acceleration facilities. 4.1) 0 international visits and study tours due to COVID 19 pandemic.
